item.title: Core Values
item.description: For at least the last 12 years or more, I have shared the following Core Values with teams and places I have worked. Now to be quite honest, I do not recall any longer if I built these on top of something else, or if I just generated these out of thin air from my own thoughts. So any semblance to others is a happy accident of like mindedness. Iâ€™m quite sure over the years, I have modified the wording a bit.

item.title: About
item.description: A Brief Bio A technically focused, solutions oriented team builder, who is known for delivery and has a reputation of getting things done. Ray has a strong career history leading in the areas of: software development, technical operations, automation, cloud and security to name a few. Ray’s experience includes everything from a seed funded startup to Fortune 500 telecoms, ISP’s financial, media and security companies. Ray has mentored numerous peopole throughout his career that have gone to great heights, in some cases, becoming Distinguised Engineers of some of the largest companies in the world.
